text: Sankyoku (Japanese: 三曲 / さんきょく) is a form of Japanese chamber music played often with a vocal accompaniment. It is traditionally played on shamisen, koto, and kokyū, but more recently the kokyū has been replaced by shakuhachi. ==See also== *Music of Japan *Koto (musical instrument) *Shakuhachi *Shamisen *Kokyū ==References== Category:Japanese traditional music
title: Sankyoku
